title: 2024 Set To Be Warmest Year On Record: European Climate Agency
content: The year 2024 is set to be the warmest on record and the first with an average temperature above 1.5 degrees Celsius, European climate agency Copernicus said on Monday.
summary: The year 2024 is set to be the warmest on record and the first with an average temperature above 1.5 degrees Celsius, European climate agency Copernicus said on Monday.

title: South Korea's Opposition Accuses Ruling Party Of 'Second Coup'
content: South Korea's opposition on Monday accused the ruling party of staging a "second coup" by clinging to power and refusing to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol over his declaration of martial law.
summary: South Korea's opposition on Monday accused the ruling party of staging a "second coup" by clinging to power and refusing to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol over his declaration of martial law.

title: Iran's Narges Mohammadi Recalls Winning Nobel Peace Prize In Prison
content: Mohammadi recalled how the women's ward at Evin prison "erupted with chants" of the protest slogan "Woman Life Freedom" when they heard she had been awarded the prize.
summary: Mohammadi recalled how the women's ward at Evin prison "erupted with chants" of the protest slogan "Woman Life Freedom" when they heard she had been awarded the prize.

title: Case Against Hindu Monk Chinmoy Krishna Das, His Followers In Bangladesh
content: A case was lodged on Sunday over a clash between police and followers of Hindu monk Chinmoy Krishna Das on the court premises in Chittagong, according to a media report.
summary: A case was lodged on Sunday over a clash between police and followers of Hindu monk Chinmoy Krishna Das on the court premises in Chittagong, according to a media report.

title: With Bashar al-Assad Gone To Russia, US Strikes ISIS Camps Inside Syria
content: The US on Sunday struck dozens of the ISIS targets inside Syria, just hours after rebels seized the capital Damascus and forced President Bashar al-Assad to flee to Russia after 13 years of civil war and six decades of his family's autocratic rule.
summary: The US on Sunday struck dozens of the ISIS targets inside Syria, just hours after rebels seized the capital Damascus and forced President Bashar al-Assad to flee to Russia after 13 years of civil war and six decades of his family's autocratic rule.

title: Assad's Fall After 24-Year Rule In Syria Risks More Middle East Chaos
content: As Bashar Al-Assad fled to Moscow, the looters started raiding the presidential palace and people took to the streets of Damascus to celebrate his demise.
summary: As Bashar Al-Assad fled to Moscow, the looters started raiding the presidential palace and people took to the streets of Damascus to celebrate his demise.

title: How World Reacted To Bashar Al-Assad's Downfall In Syria
content: World powers vowed Sunday to work for stability in Syria and the surrounding region after Islamist-led rebels toppled its longtime ruler Bashar al-Assad.
summary: World powers vowed Sunday to work for stability in Syria and the surrounding region after Islamist-led rebels toppled its longtime ruler Bashar al-Assad.

title: Will Make It "Easier" For People To Come In Legally To US, Says Trump
content: Incoming US President Donald Trump said he would go ahead with his plans to deport all illegal immigrants after entering the Oval Office
summary: Incoming US President Donald Trump said he would go ahead with his plans to deport all illegal immigrants after entering the Oval Office

title: King Charles Felt "Anxious" About His Crown "Wobbling" During Coronation
content: Britain's King Charles III said he feels "slightly anxious" when wearing the coronation crown in case it "wobbles", in an upcoming documentary about his mother's crowning ceremony.
summary: Britain's King Charles III said he feels "slightly anxious" when wearing the coronation crown in case it "wobbles", in an upcoming documentary about his mother's crowning ceremony.

title: Did Assassin's Creed Unity Help Rebuild Notre Dame? The Truth Revealed
content: Assassin's Creed Unity was set during the French Revolution where Notre Dame, modelled over a period of 14 months, played a key part in the missions.
summary: Assassin's Creed Unity was set during the French Revolution where Notre Dame, modelled over a period of 14 months, played a key part in the missions.

title: Syria Live: Assad Gets Russia Asylum, US Wants Him To Be Held Accountable
content: Ousted Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad and his family have been granted asylum in Russia, hours after the Islamist-led rebels took control of his country.
summary: Ousted Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad and his family have been granted asylum in Russia, hours after the Islamist-led rebels took control of his country.

title: "Syria Being Purified": Victory Speech By Rebel Chief Who Ended Assad Rule
content: Syria's rebel leader hailed a "historic" victory Sunday from a landmark Damascus mosque after his Islamist Hayat Tahrir al-Sham group headed a lightning offensive, snatching the capital from government control in less than two weeks.
summary: Syria's rebel leader hailed a "historic" victory Sunday from a landmark Damascus mosque after his Islamist Hayat Tahrir al-Sham group headed a lightning offensive, snatching the capital from government control in less than two weeks.

title: Ousted Syrian President Assad, Family In Moscow, Granted Asylum: Report
content: Ousted Syrian President Bashar al-Assad and family have landed in Moscow and have been granted asylum, Russia state media reported today.
summary: Ousted Syrian President Bashar al-Assad and family have landed in Moscow and have been granted asylum, Russia state media reported today.

title: Trump Aims To Deport All Immigrants In The US Illegally
content: US President-elect Donald Trump aims to deport all immigrants in the US illegally over his four-year term but wants a deal to protect so-called "Dreamer" immigrants, he said in an interview that aired on Sunday on NBC News.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump aims to deport all immigrants in the US illegally over his four-year term but wants a deal to protect so-called "Dreamer" immigrants, he said in an interview that aired on Sunday on NBC News.

title: Mystery Surrounds Whereabouts Of Assad, Who Boarded Flight From Syria
content: Mystery surrounded the whereabouts of Bashar al-Assad, who was no longer in Damascus when rebels captured the Syrian capital on Sunday, ending more than five decades of his family's rule.
summary: Mystery surrounded the whereabouts of Bashar al-Assad, who was no longer in Damascus when rebels captured the Syrian capital on Sunday, ending more than five decades of his family's rule.

title: "Syria Is Ours": Celebrations Across Syria Mark End Of Assad's Rule
content: Celebrations erupted around Syria and crowds ransacked President Bashar al-Assad's luxurious home on Sunday after Islamist-led rebels swept into Damascus and declared he had fled the country, in a spectacular end to five decades of Baath party rule.
summary: Celebrations erupted around Syria and crowds ransacked President Bashar al-Assad's luxurious home on Sunday after Islamist-led rebels swept into Damascus and declared he had fled the country, in a spectacular end to five decades of Baath party rule.

title: Netanyahu Says "Central Link In Iran's Axis Of Evil" Has Fallen In Syria
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad in Syria was a "historic day in the... Middle East" and the fall of a "central link in Iran's axis of evil".
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad in Syria was a "historic day in the... Middle East" and the fall of a "central link in Iran's axis of evil".

title: The Story Behind Rebels' Flag That May Soon Officially Symbolise Syria
content: Syrian rebels declared the fall of President Bashar al-Assad today, less than two weeks after a lightning offensive that ended his family's decades of rule.
summary: Syrian rebels declared the fall of President Bashar al-Assad today, less than two weeks after a lightning offensive that ended his family's decades of rule.

title: Explained: Fall Of Syria And Its Impact On Power Balance In The Middle East
content: In a seismic moment for the Middle East, Islamist rebels in Syria announced President Bashar al-Assad's ouster on Sunday after seizing control of Damascus, forcing him to flee and ending his family's decades of rule.
summary: In a seismic moment for the Middle East, Islamist rebels in Syria announced President Bashar al-Assad's ouster on Sunday after seizing control of Damascus, forcing him to flee and ending his family's decades of rule.

title: Notre-Dame Cathedral Holds First Mass After Five-Year Long Restoration
content: Christians are celebrating the return of the French capital's most famous place of worship, Notre Dame after a historic re-opening ceremony.
summary: Christians are celebrating the return of the French capital's most famous place of worship, Notre Dame after a historic re-opening ceremony.
